import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Vision UI Dashboard PRO React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var size=typography.size,fontWeightRegular=typography.fontWeightRegular;var grey=colors.grey,white=colors.white;export default{styleOverrides:{label:{marginTop:"".concat(pxToRem(8)," !important"),fontWeight:fontWeightRegular,fontSize:size.md,color:grey[300],"&.Mui-active":{fontWeight:"".concat(fontWeightRegular," !important"),color:"".concat(white.main," !important")},"&.Mui-completed":{fontWeight:"".concat(fontWeightRegular," !important"),color:"".concat(white.main," !important")}}}};
